segments.text: I notice the little boy is about to fall off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching so far into the cookie jar, and the stool is wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even seem worried about him falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just drying that plate, completely ignoring everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and she’s still just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the kids are going to get in trouble if she catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But right now, they’re getting away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they do this often.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just chaotic, but no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR
